author: lightclient
content: one idea to avoid going full 6404 but still getting benefit of ssz - the value added to the MPT is `BLOB_TX_TYPE || hash_tree_root(SignedBlobTx)`. That value is keccak’d and put in the trie. It lets L2s prove to specific parts of the tx without needing the entire tx and doesn’t require we come up with ssz format for all other tx types now
